name: Ext_R5_Group_type
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.Group.type for use in FHIR R4B
description: This cross-version extension represents Group.type from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/Group|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4B.

element.short: person | animal | practitioner | device | careteam | healthcareservice | location | organization | relatedperson | specimen
element.definition: Identifies the broad classification of the kind of resources the group includes.
element.comment: `Group.type` maps to R4B `Group.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

element.short: person | animal | practitioner | device | careteam | healthcareservice | location | organization | relatedperson | specimen
element.definition: Identifies the broad classification of the kind of resources the group includes.
element.comment: `Group.type` maps to R4B `Group.type`. The value set relationship of SourceIsBroaderThanTarget is INCOMPATIBLE for a required binding on a `code` type in this direction. So is mapped as SourceIsBroaderThanTarget.

binding.description: Types of resources that are part of group.
